message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I know is worth at least $1,000,000 to you. I'm confident that this product will be a valuable asset for your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,050,000.  This is a limited-time offer, as I have another buyer lined up who is willing to pay the full market value. Let me know if you're interested.
